title: The Book of Frank Herbert
description: Add to the names ofHEINLEINCLARKEBRUNNERALDISSand other titans of science fiction the name ofFRANK HERBERTwhose epic novel DUNE made SF best-seller history--along with his DUNE MESSIAH, THE SANTAROGA BARRIER, and others.DAW BOOKS proudly presents Frank Herbert's latest selection of his most outstanding fiction--ten mind-tingling tales of time, space and enigmas of man's future...THE BOOK OF FRANK HERBERT-----"Seed Stock""The Nothing""Rat Race""Gambling Device""Looking for Something?""The Gone Dogs""Passage For Piano""Encounter in a Lonely Place""Operation Syndrome""Occupation Force"
author: Frank Herbert
